text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ClinicalResearchEventReason
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ClinicalResearchObservationReason
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason

name: ClinicalResearchReason
title: ClinicalResearchReason
description: **Definition:**Contains domains for act reasons used in clinical research.
